document.full_text: in an article, published in the new york times, david einhorn took note of how warnings about bernard l. madoff were not heeded by the authorities or his investors.
document.title: mets' partner was critical of carelessness on madoff
lines_and_colors: in an article, published in the new york times, david einhorn took note of how warnings about bernard l. madoff were not heeded by the authorities or his investors.
